subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Paulie Malignaggi successfully defended his International Boxing Federation junior-welterweight title Saturday night, unanimously outpointing Canada’s Herman Ngoudjo in Atlantic City. Malignaggi (24-1), of Brooklyn, and Ngoudjo (16-2), a native of Cameroon, treated a capacity crowd at Bally’s ballroom to an exciting fight, with the outcome in doubt until Malignaggi took control in the later rounds.
